branchCategory.name: Main Line Filters
branchCategory.description: <p>SMC's upstream air preparation filters separate and remove mist and particles in compressed air that is difficult to remove with standard air filters. Depending on the unit, removal of contaminants down to  0.01 micron is possible. Large capacity filters and centrifugal water separators are also available.</p>

branchItem.name: AM
branchItem.description: <p>Series AM can separate and remove oil mist in compressed air, which is difficult to remove by ordinary air filters and removes solid particles such as rust or carbon of more than 0.1 micron. It is the most suitable for air sources that drive pilot, metal seal solenoid valves.</p>

branchItem.name: AMH
AMG
AMD
AME
branchItem.description: <p>Series AME separates and adsorbs aerosol state fine oil particles in compressed air and changes the oil lubricating compressed air to oil-free equivalent air. It should be applied for filtration of compressed air requiring high cleanliness for coating lines, compressed air for clean rooms and compressed air for equipment necessary to avoid oils.</p>

branchItem.name: AMF
branchItem.description: <P>Series AMF odor removal filter efficiently removes odor in compressed air with an activated carbon element. The unit is designed for use in food processing, pharmaceutical,&nbsp;and brewing&nbsp;systems where odor must be removed. </P>

branchItem.name: AFF
AFW
branchItem.description: <p>AFW large capacity compressed air filters and centrifugal water separators ensure high quality compressed air, which is essential to pneumatic and automation systems.&nbsp; Correct air preparation minimizes component failure, increases the operating life of equipment and reduces energy consumption.&nbsp; Filters and separators are suitable for use with mineral and synthetic oils, plus oil-free compressed air applications.&nbsp; Depending on the model, flow capacities are available from&nbsp;150 to 1500 CFM.&nbsp; The AFW is available for US and Canadian customers only.</p>
